text: Marik may refer to: * Marik language, an Austronesian language spoken in Papua New Guinea * Marik Ishtar, a character in the manga Yu-Gi-Oh! * Marik Vos- Lundh (1923–1994), a Swedish costume designer and production designer * Iren Marik (1905–1986), a Hungarian classical pianist * Michal Mařík, a Czech ice hockey goaltender * Paul E. Marik, a professor of medicine and sepsis treatment researcher * Marik, Iran, a village in Chaharmahal and Bakhtiari Province, Iran * 28492 Marik, an asteroid
title: Marik
